registration_enabled.label: Enable New User Registration
registration_enabled.description: Allow new users to create accounts. Disable during testing or maintenance.

maintenance_mode.label: Maintenance Mode
maintenance_mode.description: Show maintenance page to all users except admins

max_file_size_mb.label: Maximum File Size (MB)
max_file_size_mb.description: Maximum size for uploaded CV/resume files

new_user_welcome_credit.label: Welcome Credit for New Users (USD)
new_user_welcome_credit.description: Starting balance given to new accounts. Set to 0 for production.

enable_document_length_warnings.label: Enable Document Length Warnings
enable_document_length_warnings.description: Show warnings when JD or resumes exceed character limits. Disable to allow full-length documents without user confirmation.
